overview: Despite Kevin Warhol's best efforts at organizing, all of the boys make it to the location for the big 20th Anniversary orgy and it is time to get things underway. For those of you who may think that producing and orgy is simply a matter of getting all the boys together and filming them have sex, nothing could be further from the truth: Filming outside, the boys need sunscreen, they need a makeshift gym to tone their bodies into perfect shape, and most importantly, boys being boys, they need food and to be entertained.
title: 20th Anniversary Orgy
